Your kitten is so cute, omg! 🥺
But *Jungkook's* vocals are amazing, like I got goosebumps whenever I'm listening to this
So, so beautiful, he touched my heart, oh my gosh he makes me cry, so amazing voice

comments_since_last_sample.body: Cute siamese...I prefer Jungkook's version his voice is so soothing to the ears..

There is a doku series made by an army which shows you all parts in bts carreer from the debut. It's called The Rise of Bangtan and has already 17 episodes. You should watch it cuz it's really well done with all the BTS behind the scene contents. And omg your kitten is so cute!
Not to be dramatic but I’d protect your cat with my life

Motley is absolutely adorable.  Yes, JK blew this out of the water.  The texture of his voice is absolute butter.  I still prefer Harry's version just because I know he wrote it so it comes from a special place.  And this version lends itself a certain mood because it's a more stripped down version.  But this is truly perfection.
So, so beautiful, he touched my heart, oh my gosh he makes me cry, so amazing voice
U should check out all the covers Jungkook has done like Nothing like us and 2U by Justin Beiber

Your kitten is so cute, omg! 🥺
But *Jungkook's* vocals are amazing, like I got goosebumps whenever I'm listening to this
